name: NewsEdge
description: A modern full-stack newspaper web application with user roles, premium subscription system, admin panel, article publishing, and payment history tracking.
challenges: Implementing dynamic premium access based on subscription duration, and managing complex admin workflows with article approval and analytics.
futureImprovements: Add multi-language support, push notifications for updates, advanced analytics dashboard, and bookmark/save article functionality.

name: Creative Agency
description: A full-stack agency website where users can book services, view orders, and admins can manage tasks.
challenges: Integrating Firebase Auth with role-based access control, dynamic service management for admin and users.
futureImprovements: Add payment integration, admin dashboard charts, service search and filter features.

name: Library Zone
description: A reading community site where users can add books, write reviews, and manage a personal reading list.
challenges: Building a realtime book list with Firebase and creating an intuitive review interface.
futureImprovements: Add author bios, book search feature, pagination and admin removal tools.

name: Phone Vibe
description: A product showcase site for smartphones featuring product details and responsive design.
challenges: Designing dynamic product pages using React Router and optimizing images for performance.
futureImprovements: Implement cart and wishlist features, improve filtering, and integrate backend.
